description: This file defines a React Native component 'RecipeCard' used for displaying recipe summaries, including image, title, tags, and metadata. It imports React, React Native primitives, theme styles, and a TagChip component, and exports the RecipeCard functional component.

methods.name: RecipeCard
methods.description: Functional React component that renders a clickable recipe card with image, title, tags, and metadata.

methods.name: handlePress
methods.description: Internal handler triggered when the card is pressed; invokes the onPress callback with the recipe.
